items.title: Create Azure Function App
items.description: Provision and configure an Azure Function App in the target subscription and resource group.
acceptance_criteria: Azure Function App is created in the specified Azure subscription and resource group
Function App runtime stack and version match project requirements
Function App is accessible via its default endpoint
Deployment slots are configured if required
non_functional: Function App should have 99.9% uptime SLA

notes: Runtime stack, region, and scaling configuration were not specified; assumptions made that these will be defined later.
